verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where the Spirit of the Lord is There is freedom Where the spirit of the Lord is There is freedom{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lift your eyes to heaven There is freedom x2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Freedom reigns in this place Showers of mercy and grace Falling on every face There is freedom{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If you’re tired and thirsty There is freedom x2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give your all to Jesus There is freedom x2{/lang-eng}
